title: Soo does this "mute emotes" button not actually work?
body: I've noticed that there's a mute emotes button I don't remember it being there so it had to of been added recently..yet it doesn't seem to be working. I still hear champions spamming their laughs even though they are muted.

replies.body: I believe that muting option only mutes the new Emotes that will be coming shortly. They're still being tested on PBE currently.
Correct me if I'm wrong, but the emotes refer to the ones you can get from the Shop and the Mastery emotes. You know, like the ones you get from Mastery 4 and onwards.
